title: Williams drops 40 as OKC fends off Pacers in G5

title: Ohtani allows 1 run, 2 hits in 28-pitch inning
content: Shohei Ohtani made his pitching debut from Dodger Stadium on Monday, giving up a run in his lone inning of work, then struck out in his first plate appearance as Los Angeles' DH, marking the first time he has pitched and hit in a game since Aug. 23, 2023.

title: Red Sox execs defend Devers deal, cite 'alignment'
content: A day after trading All-Star slugger Rafael Devers to the Giants, Red Sox president Sam Kennedy told reporters on Monday night that Devers' refusal to change positions made it untenable for him to remain with the team.

title: Arkansas' Wood throws 1st MCWS no-no since '60
content: Arkansas' Gage Wood pitched the third no-hitter in College World Series history and first in 65 years on Monday, striking out a record 19 Murray State batters in a 3-0 victory.

title: Source: Steelers extend S Elliott on 2-year deal
content: The Pittsburgh Steelers and safety DeShon Elliott have agreed to a two-year, $12.5 million extension with $9.21 million guaranteed.

title: U.S. hockey names first 6 players for '26 Olympics
content: The U.S. named Matthew and Brady Tkachuk, Auston Matthews, Jack Eichel, Quinn Hughes and Charlie McAvoy as its first six players for the 2026 Olympics, avoiding goaltenders on the initial roster unveiled Monday.

content: A trio of Socceroos who call MLS home are confident the league's rising standards will bolster their hopes of being part of the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

content: Russia has launched a major missile and drone attack on Kyiv overnight on Tuesday, killing at least 14 people and wounding several others, according to Ukrainian officials.

content: With tears welling in his eyes and folded hands, Captain Sumeet Sabharwal's father paid tribute to his son, pilot of the Air India plane which crashed in Ahmedabad on June 12.

content: Royal Navy's F-35B stealth fighter jet remains on the ground at Thiruvananthapuram airport, over 48 hours after making an emergency landing on Sunday morning.

title: UPI Transactions Can Now Be Completed In 10 To 15 Seconds: What It Means
content: Users will now see payments, balance checks, and reversals processed within 10 to 15 seconds, a sharp improvement from the earlier 30-second wait.

content: Haryana model murder case: Sunil, boyfriend of Haryana model Sheetal, has confessed to killing her and throwing the body in a canal.

title: PM Modi Lands In Canada For G7 Summit. Why This Visit Is Important
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed at the Calgary International Airport in Canada on Tuesday to attend the G7 Summit that is taking place at the nearby Kananaskis village in Alberta.

title: Air India Crash: 125 DNA Matches Confirmed, 83 Bodies Handed Over To Families
content: Gujarat Home Minister Harsh Sanghavi on Monday confirmed that DNA samples of 125 victims in the Air India plane crash had been successfully matched, and families of 124 deceased had been contacted.

title: "Drone-Filled Skies, Every Minute Getting Worse": Indian Students In Tehran
content: As tensions continue to rise in West Asia, Indian students in Tehran recalled the initial hours of the conflict between Israel and Iran.

content: Israel and Iran attacked each other for a fifth straight day on Tuesday, and US President Donald Trump urged Iranians to evacuate Tehran, citing what he said was the country's rejection of a deal to curb nuclear weapons development.

title: "Arrogant": BJP Attacks Lalu Yadav For Allegedly Insulting BR Ambedkar
content: Union Minister Arjun Ram Meghwal has criticised RJD chief Lalu Prasad Yadav for allegedly insulting BR Ambedkar and called him "arrogant" for "not apologising" over the matter.

title: India Well-Positioned To Meet Its Fuel Needs: Minister Amid Mideast Tensions
content: Union Minister for Petroleum and Natural Gas, Hardeep Singh Puri on Monday reviewed India's petroleum supply situation with top officials of the Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas and executives from state-run oil companies.

title: Middle East on edge: Trump abruptly leaves G7; is a US strike on Iran‚Äôs bomb-making facility coming?
content: President Trump abruptly left the G-7 summit amid escalating Middle East tensions, hinting at potential US involvement in an Israeli strike against Iran's nuclear program. This decision has sparked controversy, with some MAGA figures like Tucker Carlson and Marjorie Taylor Greene criticizing Trump for abandoning his "America First" policy and risking a wider conflict.

title: Israel-Iran tensions: Indians asked to 'move to a safe location' outside Tehran
content: The Indian Embassy in Tehran has issued an urgent advisory, urging Indian nationals and Persons of Indian Origin (PIOs) residing in the Iranian capital to relocate to safer areas. Citing a worsening security situation, the embassy advises those who can leave Tehran using their own means to do so immediately.

title: No red beacon, no frills: Old video of former Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani resurfaces - watch
content: Former Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani passed away in a plane crash. He was known for his simple lifestyle. A video resurfaced showing Rupani removing the red beacon from his official car. This act symbolized his commitment to humility. The Gujarat government banned red beacons for VIP vehicles. Rupani also instructed police not to halt traffic for his convoy

title: Meghalaya honeymoon murder: Sonam declared mentally sound
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi, accused of murdering her husband Raja during their honeymoon in Sohra, underwent a mental health assessment and was deemed sound. Her brother has been summoned for questioning as the investigation continues. Authorities plan to recreate the crime scene with the five suspects, while Raja's family held a private 'tehrvi' ceremony, grappling with unanswered questions and demanding further investigation.

title: IPL | Buttler on Vaibhav Suryavanshi: 'His bat swing is like Yuvraj and Lara'
content: Jos Buttler lauded 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi's incredible talent, drawing comparisons to Brian Lara and Yuvraj Singh after witnessing his explosive 35-ball century in the IPL. Buttler highlighted Suryavanshi's fearless approach and ability to dominate world-class bowlers like Siraj, Krishna, and Rashid Khan. He further praised the young batter's composed performance against Chennai, showcasing maturity beyond his age.

title: When Elon Musk suggested Boeing's problem may be having too many managers who are ...
content: Following the Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner crash in Ahmedabad, which killed 241 passengers and crew, safety concerns have risen. A resurfaced tweet from Elon Musk criticizing Boeing's management has added fuel to the fire. The DGCA has ordered enhanced safety inspections for Air India's Dreamliner fleet.

title: Controversy avoided! R Ashwin, team cleared of ball-tampering allegations in TNPL
content: R Ashwin, the former Indian cricketer, has been cleared of ball-tampering allegations in the Tamil Nadu Premier League (TNPL). The Madurai franchise accused Ashwin's team, Dindigul Dragons, of using chemically treated towels to alter the ball's condition during their match.

title: Gold price prediction today: What will be the impact of Iran-Israel conflict?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are fluctuating due to the ongoing Iran-Israel conflict, initially surging before easing on de-escalation hopes. Despite Iran's willingness to negotiate, tensions remain high, influencing market sentiment. Investors are closely monitoring geopolitical developments, US economic data, and central bank decisions for further direction, with potential support and resistance levels identified.

title: Aruna Irani reveals she didn't have kids with Kuku Kohli as she was his second wife
content: Aruna Irani opened up about her marriage with Kuku Kohli and past relationship with Mehmood. She confessed to falling for Kohli, a married man, despite her prior experience. Irani revealed she chose not to have children, fearing they would face stigma as she did being born to a second wife.

title: Nothing CEO reacts to Trump‚Äôs smartphone launch; says ‚ÄòWe‚Äôre cooked‚Äô
content: The Trump Organization has entered the mobile market with Trump Mobile, launching the T1 Phone, priced at $499. Unveiled by Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump, the Android 15 device boasts a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, 50MP camera, and 5000mAh battery. Targeting customers seeking American-made products, the T1 Phone aims to capture a share of the U.S.

title: Exclusive | 'Your main job is to perform... ': Ex-England captain on Gill
content: Former England captain Graham Gooch shares his insights ahead of the India-England Test series, emphasizing the honor of captaincy and the importance of Shubman Gill performing with the bat. Gooch believes England has a point to prove with their aggressive approach, while also acknowledging the home advantage.

title: IND vs ENG: ‚ÄòWant Bumrah and Stokes available...‚Äô - Rob Key
content: "That‚Äôs why people turn on the TV," says Rob Key, Managing Director of the England men's cricket team, as he Talks to TOI on the upcoming five-test series, the changing attitudes of English cricket & why it‚Äôs imperative to create the perfect environment for players to deliver their best.

title: G7 summit: PM Modi arrives in Canada; what's on agenda, why his visit matters?
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is in Canada for the G7 Summit, marking his first visit in a decade. Discussions will center on energy security and technology. Invited by Canadian PM Mark Carney, this visit aims to improve strained relations following previous diplomatic tensions.  Ties between the two countries had worsened after the killing of pro-Khalistani separatist Hardeep Singh Nijjar in June 2023.

title: US China trade war: How China dodges the US chip ban; flying suitcases, & ...
content: Chinese firms are devising ingenious methods to circumvent US AI chip restrictions, including processing data abroad. Recently, engineers transported hard drives filled with data to Malaysia, utilizing Nvidia's advanced chips in a local data center to train an AI model. Southeast Asia is becoming a hub for these activities, with data centers rapidly expanding.

title: Haryana model murder case: Tattoos help ID body; last seen with boyfriend
content: Haryana model Sheetal, also known as Simmi Chaudhary, was found dead in a canal near Sonipat, bearing injuries from a sharp weapon. She had been missing since June 14 after leaving for a shoot. Her boyfriend, Sunil, was found in his car in a canal in Panipat and has been arrested. Police are investigating complaints Sheetal previously filed against Sunil.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 above 24,900; BSE Sensex opens on a choppy note
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened on a choppy note on Tuesday. While Nifty50 was above 24,900, BSE Sensex was near 81,750.

title: Technical snag in engine: Air India San Francisco-Mumbai flight halted in Kolkata
content: Air India flight AI180, traveling from San Francisco to Mumbai, experienced a technical malfunction in its left engine upon landing at Kolkata's Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Airport at 12:45 am. The aircraft landed on schedule, but the engine snag delayed its onward journey. Passengers were asked to deplane around 5:20 am, with the captain citing flight safety as the reason.

title: 'Pushing us to nuclear brink': Netanyahu accuses Iran of pushing 'forever war'; watch video
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu accused Iran of pushing the Middle East towards a "forever war," warning of a looming nuclear conflict. He advocated for directly targeting Iranian leadership, including Supreme Leader Khamenei, to end hostilities. Netanyahu blamed Iran for regional instability, citing its alleged involvement in attacks and nuclear ambitions, urging international action to prevent a global threat.

title: IPL: 'What is this man telling Virat Kohli?'; Atherton roasts Karthik
content: Michael Atherton playfully questioned Dinesh Karthik about a lengthy timeout conversation with Virat Kohli during the IPL final. Atherton joked that Kohli's dismissal in the following over suggested Karthik's advice was ineffective. Karthik, struggling to recall the specifics, faced further ribbing from Nasser Hussain for his uncharacteristic silence on the matter.

title: 'Don‚Äôt need Sunjay Kapur‚Äôs money': Randhir Kapoor never approved Karisma‚Äôs marriage
content: Randhir Kapoor voiced his disapproval of Karisma Kapoor's marriage to Sunjay Kapur, emphasizing the Kapoor family's independence from Sunjay's wealth. The couple's 2003 marriage ended in a contentious 2016 divorce, with allegations of infidelity and financial disputes. Sunjay Kapur, who passed away in June 2025, amassed a $1.2 billion fortune through Sona Comstar.

title: India Post GDS 4th merit list 2025 released at indiapostgdsonline.gov.in:Check here
content: India Post has announced the 4th merit list for GDS Recruitment 2025 on its website, indiapostgdsonline.gov.in, listing candidates selected for various Gramin Dak Sevak posts based on their Class 10 marks. Shortlisted candidates must now prepare for document verification, ensuring they have all required original documents and photocopies ready for submission as per the notification from their Divisional Head/Post Office.

title: 'Immediately evacuate Tehran': Trump's big warning amid Iran-Israel conflict; to leave G7 summit early
content: US President Trump issued a stark warning to Tehran, urging immediate evacuation amid escalating tensions and potential nuclear concerns. This followed reports of an Israeli airstrike on Iran's state broadcaster and significant damage to a major uranium enrichment facility. While Iran seeks US intervention, Trump hints at a potential diplomatic deal post-G7 summit, diverging from other leaders' calls for de-escalation.

title: HISTORY! Netherlands edge Nepal after THREE Super Overs - watch video
content: In a historic cricket match in Glasgow, the Netherlands triumphed over Nepal after an unprecedented three Super Overs. The thrilling contest saw both teams matching each other throughout, with Nepal forcing the first Super Over with a late surge. Ultimately, the Netherlands secured the win thanks to Zach Lion-Cachet's decisive final Super Over performance and Michael Levitt's winning six.

title: India backs Cyprus in its fight against Turkiye
content: Amidst escalating tensions between Israel and Iran, PM Modi, during his Cyprus visit, advocated for dialogue and stability. He emphasized that this is not an era of war, echoing concerns about conflicts in West Asia and Europe. Modi reaffirmed India's support for Cyprus's sovereignty and unity, addressing the Cyprus Question based on UN resolutions.

title: Israel-Iran conflict: India starts evacuating students from Iran
content: Amid escalating Israel-Iran air strikes, the Indian government is relocating Indian students within Iran for their safety. Approximately 600 students have been moved to Qom from Tehran, a target of Israeli strikes, while 110 students from Urmia are near the Armenian border, awaiting evacuation. External Affairs Minister Jaishankar is actively engaged with regional counterparts to address the situation.

title: Joblessness rate rises to 5.6% in May from 5.1% in April: PLFS
content: India's unemployment rate edged up to 5.6% in May, a rise from 5.1% in April, as revealed by the Periodic Labour Force Survey. Simultaneously, the labor force participation rate experienced a dip, signaling tightening conditions in the job market.

title: Watch: Anchor runs for life as Israel bombs Iran State TV; studio turns to dust
content: Tensions escalate as Israel bombs Iranian state news amid ongoing hostilities. A video shows a news presenter fleeing as an explosion rocks the studio. Despite the attack, Iran's broadcasting service resumed coverage, vowing resilience. This follows a fresh wave of Iranian missile strikes on Israel, resulting in casualties and heightened fears of a wider regional conflict.

title: Poll-day webcasting now at all polling booths to help EC monitor procedures
content: The Election Commission has mandated webcasting across all polling stations with internet connectivity to monitor procedures and prevent poll process violations. In areas lacking internet, alternative arrangements like videography will be implemented. Monitoring control rooms will be established at various levels, overseen by nodal officers, to ensure live observation and prompt action on any suspicious activity.

title: Air India crash: 70 tolas gold; at crash site, 1st responder's grit shines
content: Following the AI 171 crash near BJ Medical College, construction businessman Raju Patel and his crew were among the first responders. Braving intense flames, they assisted in rescuing the injured using makeshift stretchers and later recovered valuables from the wreckage, including gold jewellery and cash.

title: College student raped by 10 on Odisha beach
content: In a shocking incident in Odisha's Ganjam, a 20-year-old college student was allegedly gang-raped on a beach by a group of ten men. The assault occurred after the perpetrators attacked her male friend who was accompanying her.

title: Census process officially kicksoff, NPR unlikely to be updated
content: India's Census process, delayed by the pandemic, is set to resume in 2027, prioritizing a digital approach. The exercise will occur in two phases, starting with housing listing in 2026, followed by population enumeration in 2027.

title: In bid to retrieve lota, man & son suffocate to death in well
content: In a tragic incident in Jharkhand's Palamu district, a 65-year-old father and his 37-year-old son died of asphyxiation inside a dry well. The incident occurred when the son attempted to retrieve a stainless steel 'lota' that had fallen into the well filled with rotten mahua fruits.

title: Covid-19: With 11 deaths, current wave toll in country past 100-mark
content: India's Covid-19 death toll has surpassed 100, with 11 deaths reported on Monday, the highest single-day increase in the current wave. Kerala accounts for the majority of fatalities, with victims having pre-existing conditions. While new sub-variants are suspected to be driving the surge, experts say symptoms remain mild, and most cases are managed at home with symptomatic treatment.

title: ‚ÄòHousefull 5‚Äô BO collection: Akshay Kumar's film inches closer to Rs 160 cr mark
content: Housefull 5 is a box office success. The comedy film stars Akshay Kumar, Abhishek Bachchan, and Riteish Deshmukh. It has earned close to Rs 160 crore. The movie was released on June 6, 2025. The film maintains strong collections. The movie features a star-studded cast. It includes Sanjay Dutt, Jackie Shroff and others. The film attracts audiences to cinema halls.

title: Bike taxi captain & woman attack each other in Bengaluru, cops arrest the man
content: In Bengaluru, a Rapido bike taxi captain named Suman was arrested after allegedly slapping a female rider, Priya, who criticized his reckless driving. Priya claimed Suman drove rashly and refused to follow the designated route, leading to an argument when she ended the ride early.

title: Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce's love inspires cheetah cubs named after them, fans swoon
content: Two orphaned cheetah cubs, Taylor and Travis, are rescued from illegal wildlife trade. They now thrive at a conservation center in Somaliland. The cubs have formed a strong bond. Staff at the center named them after Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce. The cheetahs are inseparable, often grooming and napping together. Their story highlights unexpected friendships and enduring love.

title: JJ Peterka trade buzz grows: Sabres open to offers amid sign-and-trade talks
content: Buffalo Sabres are considering trading JJ Peterka. The young winger's impressive performance has attracted attention from other teams. General Manager Kevyn Adams is evaluating potential offers. Contract negotiations could lead to a trade. Peterka's departure could reshape the Sabres' roster. A sign-and-trade deal might bring valuable assets. The team aims for a more aggressive overhaul.

title: Hope to conclude EU FTA by year-end: PM Modi
content: PM Modi has reaffirmed India's commitment to finalize a free trade agreement with the European Union by the end of the year, highlighting the potential benefits for all stakeholders. Discussions have accelerated, with the next negotiation round scheduled for July 7. Furthermore, the India Middle-East Europe Economic Corridor, though delayed, is expected to foster regional peace and prosperity.

title: Man who dodged AI 171 crash boards AI 159 with prayers
content: The first Ahmedabad to London Gatwick flight since the Dreamliner crash took off with a mix of apprehension and faith. Passengers, including one who narrowly avoided the previous flight, expressed nervousness and trust in Air India.

title: SC: No shield for a man who didn't report unaccounted money in account for months
content: The Supreme Court denied anticipatory bail to a Bihar man who delayed reporting a suspicious ‚Çπ20 lakh deposit in his account for four months. Delhi police summoned him for cyber fraud after the money, linked to a crime, appeared in his account. He claimed his tenant misused his account details obtained under the pretext of online loan transfer.

title: Supreme Court lawyer body slams ED notice to senior advocate
content: The Supreme Court Advocates on Record Association (SCAORA) has strongly condemned the Enforcement Directorate's (ED) notice to senior advocate Arvind Datar regarding his legal opinion on employee stock options granted to Rashmi Saluja.

title: China adding 100 nuclear warheads annually: SIPRI
content: China is rapidly expanding its nuclear arsenal, adding 100 warheads annually and surpassing India's stockpile significantly. While India maintains a slight lead over Pakistan, recent military tensions risked nuclear escalation. Both nations are developing advanced delivery systems, including multiple warhead capabilities, heightening concerns about regional stability and the potential for catastrophic miscalculation.

title: 'Cyber Suraksha': Armed forces launch cybersecurity drill
content: Amid escalating cyber threats from China and Pakistan, the armed forces have initiated a 12-day 'Cyber Suraksha' exercise. Organized by the Defence Cyber Agency, the multi-phase program aims to enhance national-level cyber resilience. Over 100 participants are involved in simulated real-world scenarios, reinforcing secure practices and testing cyber skills to cultivate a security-first culture.

title: Travis Kelce‚Äôs weight loss stirs drama: fans speculate Swift‚Äôs influence
content: Travis Kelce's offseason transformation, including a reported 25-pound weight loss, has sparked fan discussions, with some attributing it to his relationship with Taylor Swift. NFL insider Jeremy Fowler highlighted Kelce's commitment to slimming down after playing heavier last season. While some fans speculate about Swift's influence, others commend Kelce's dedication to peak performance for the upcoming season.

title: Minister promises necessary funds for widening roads in Raichur district of Karnataka
content: PWD Minister Satish Jarkiholi said that development of an area depends on the condition of roads and good connectivity

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Centre's probe panel to submit report in three months
content: The safety checks of 12 of them have been done and no issue has been found so far, the Minister of State for Civil Aviation, says Union Minister of State for Civil Aviation Murlidhar Mohol

title: Congress says open to alliance in U.P. but also focused on rebuilding its strength on ground
content: In the 2024 Lok Sabha elections, the Congress-Samajwadi Party alliance delivered a strong performance‚Äîthe Congress winning six of the 17 seats it contested and the SP bagging 37 seats

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: ‚ÄòWe grieve together,‚Äô says U.K. Deputy PM Rayner at vigil for victims
content: At a multi-faith memorial service organised by India House in London on Monday (June 16, 2025), Ms. Rayner was joined by fellow parliamentarians, Foreign Office officials and members of the Indian community as they paid solemn tributes to the lives lost in the Ahmedabad plane crash.

title: Road connecting Belagavi-Bagalkot districts to be upgraded at a cost of ‚Çπ300 crore
content: The project is expected to boost trade, commerce and tourism, apart from helping residents of border villages seek healthcare in hospitals in neighbouring districts

title: Belagavi farmers tie buffalo in gram panchayat office following exceptional delay in approval for animal sheds
content: Zilla Panchayat Chief Executive Officer Rahul Shinde said that he would tell a senior officer to look into the complaint

title: ‚ÄòThe pot calling the kettle black‚Äô, says JD(U) leader Ashok Choudhary after Tejashwi accused NDA of ‚Äòfavoritism‚Äô
content: Bihar Minister Ashok Choudhary responded after RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav‚Äôs accused the ruling NDA government  of practicing ‚Äúfavoritism‚Äù

title: Agents who dupe poor with promises of a future abroad devalue Indian passport, says Supreme Court
content: The court made the remarks while hearing a case against an agent accused of tricking people off their money by promising them a career abroad

title: What is the significance of the Shipki La pass? | Explained
content: Why was tourism and trade stopped at the Shipki La pass? What is the cultural and spiritual connection that binds people on both sides of the border? Did the Shipki La pass account for a great volume of bilateral trade between India and China? Will its reopening encourage religious tourism?

title: BJP MP Abhijit Gangopadhyay critically ill, hospitalised
content: Hospital officials say he is suffering from acute pancreatitis with gastrointestinal sepsis and is currently under close observation in the ICU; State president of the BJP Sukanta Majumdar visits ex-HC judge at the hospital

title: Karnataka anganwadi workers to lock centres, boycott work as part of mass protest on July 9
content: The Karnataka State Anganwadi Workers Association affiliated to centre of Indian trade Union (CITU) has decided to shut down the anganwadi centres and boycott work on July 9 as part of the mass protest organised by the anganwadi workers and helpers.

title: New Tatkal rules aimed at curbing bots and bulk train ticket bookings | Data
content: As 60% of Tatkal tickets are bought in the first 10 minutes of the booking window, the new system aims to give genuine users a fighting chance

title: Four suspected illegal Bangladeshi immigrants held in Pune
content: On verification, they were purportedly found to be Bangladeshi citizens named Swapan Mandal, Mithun Kumar, Ranodhir Mandal, and Dilip Mondal

title: Air India flight from San Francisco to Mumbai suffers technical snag; passengers deplaned in Kolkata
content: Flight AI180 arrived on time at 0045 hrs at the airport but the technical snag in the left engine resulted in the take off getting delayed.

title: PM Modi arrives in Canada for G7 Summit
content: Prime Minister Modi will also hold several bilateral meetings on the sidelines of the Summit, coming over a month after India's Operation Sindoor that had targeted terror infrastructure in Pakistan and Pakistan-occupied Kashmir in retaliation for the April 22 Pahalgam attacks.

title: Indians turning to Artificial Intelligence for news, influencers find big audience: report
content: The Reuters Institute for the Study of Journalism‚Äôs annual Digital News Report finds that Indians prefer video content for news, and rely on generative AI for summarising and personalising news

title: Minor landslides reported in Kasaragod; river breaches bank in Kannur
content: Torrential rain causes widespread disruption in Kasaragod and Kannur, prompting closures, landslides, and flood alerts in affected areas

title: Delhi-bound Air India flight returns to Hong Kong after snag
content: Air India flight AI 315 safely returns to Hong Kong due to technical issue, passengers assisted, aircraft under inspection

title: BJP MLAs walk out from West Bengal Assembly; one suspended, another cautioned
content: Manoj Oraon was suspended for the day for improper conduct during Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee‚Äôs address; the Speaker cautioned BJP Chief Whip Sankar Ghosh

title: BJP goverments targeting Bengalis; labelling them Bangladeshi for speaking their tongue: Mamata
content: The Chief Minister‚Äôs remarks came a day after three residents of West Bengal, working in Mumbai were allegedly forced into Bangladesh by the BSF

title: Amitabh Kant resigns as G-20 Sherpa, thanks PM Modi for the opportunities
content: The retired IAS officer had also served as NTI Aayog CEO, Secretary of the then Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion, and Joint Secretary at the Ministry of Tourism

title: Seeman shoots election salvo from palm tree; says govt. should remove ban on toddy
content: When we come to power, we will ban foreign liquor except in select places, says the NTK chief; Toddy is not banned in other States because their Chief Ministers are not connected to liquor manufacturers, he adds

title: T.N. Forest Department deputes mahouts and cavadies to Thailand for elephant care training
content: A team of 18 members will be deputed from June 17 to June 21; the delegation includes four mahouts, 11 cavadies, a forest range officer, and a forest veterinary assistant surgeon

title: IIT Madras Pravartak¬†launches course in machine learning operations
content: The online 110-hour certification MLOps course, jointly offered with TCS iON, aims to prepare professionals for careers in AI, ML and to address the demand for talent in the evolving domain of machine learning operations

title: Domestic workers urge Union government to enact law for fair wages, social security
content: Tamil Nadu Domestic Workers Welfare Trust submitted a petition to the State govt. to extend the Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act to domestic workers, among other demands

title: Minibuses to serve more than 25,000 km of unserved areas in Tamil Nadu
content: Chief Minister M.K.Stalin launches New Comprehensive Mini Bus Service with extended permitted route lengths

title: Footpath along Taluk Office Road revamped with lights, fountains
content: The Highways Department beautified the 300-m-long stretch adjacent to its campus in Saidapet. It now has seating arrangements and grass beds

title: Classes at newly sanctioned Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas to commence from July 14
content: Seven JNVs coming up in Bhadradri Kothagudem, Jagtial, Mahabubnagar, Medchal-Malkajgiri, Nizamabad, Sangareddy and Suryapet districts

title: Government scheme helps boy from Virudhunagar get admission to NIT Rourkela
content: The boy was selected under the Naan Mudhalvan scheme, implemented by Virudhunagar district administration, and was provided with coaching and reading materials to clear JEE Mains

title: Telangana healthcare gets a bureaucratic boost; civil servants choose govt. hospitals for medical needs
content: Their choices are reshaping perceptions, showing that trust in the State‚Äôs healthcare system is no longer limited to the underprivileged, but shared by those who help shape public policy themselves

title: GHMC Commissioner issues detailed SoP for sealing of unauthorised premises
content: The standard operating procedure issued clarifies that only a higher authority than the sealing officer can unseal a property

title: SCR set to shrink in scope as South Coast Railway gains steam
content: Newly-carved zone likely to become operational in 3 months; gazette notification to be issued after revised detailed project report, currently under review by Railway Board, is submitted

title: Telangana Intermediate Supplementary results announced; about 1.23 lakh first-year students show improvement
content: A total of 4,13,880 students, for both general and vocational stream, appeared in the Supplementary exams conducted at 892 centres

title: SFI‚Äôs protest before Kerala Raj Bhavan over photos of RSS leaders
content: A section of protesters tried to run into the campus of the Governor‚Äôs official residence, but the police swiftly stopped them using force

title: DRDO and IIT-Delhi demonstrate free-space quantum secure communication over one-km distance
content: Considered a major breakthrough in the field of cybersecurity, the use of quantum entanglement is being described as a landmark achievement in the new quantum era of secure communication

title: New flowering plant species discovered in Aravali hills landscape near Jaipur
content: The plant was first spotted by researcher Nishant Chauhan, a committee member of the Satpura Biodiversity Conservation Society, who noticed a unique Portulaca-like succulent growing from the rock crevice on the dry and rocky hill slopes near the historic Galtaji temple on the outskirts of Jaipur

title: India to export 150 locomotives to Africa worth over ‚Çπ3,000 crore
content: The 4,500-HP locomotives are equipped with air-conditioned driver‚Äôs compartment, regenerative braking, microprocessor-based controls, and modular architecture

title: Government sent the right message to world through Operation Sindoor, says Vice-President
content: People have to believe in nationalism and the political class must remain united on all national issues, Vice-President Jagdeep Dhankhar said at a programme held at Jipmer in Puducherry

title: India will never forgive Lalu Prasad for insulting Ambedkar, says Chouhan
content: Union Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan said that RJD chief Lalu Prasad has ‚Äúinsulted‚Äù B.R. Ambedkar; Ministers Arjun Ram Meghwal and Bhupender Yadav demanded an apology from Mr. Prasad

title: Advocates‚Äô body issues statement against ED notice to senior advocate Arvind Datar
content: Even though the summons against Arvind Datar has since been withdrawn, the association said it registers its strong protest against the move

title: Day after chopper crash, Uttarakhand government to resume helicopter services from June 17
content: Uttarakhand Civil Aviation Development Authority CEO Sonika announces the resumption and adds that services will only run if the weather conditions will be favourable; Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) is going to keep a close watch on all shuttle services

title: India starts relocating citizens from Tehran¬†to other parts of Iran, considers exit routes from Israel for Indian citizens
content: As conflict escalates, EAM Jaishankar speaks to counterparts in Armenia and UAE; Indian embassy in Tehran working with local Iranian authorities to shift Indian citizens in the capital and other places to safer locations; in Israel, where the airspace is closed completely, Indian embassy officials in Tel Aviv are guiding citizens who can move out towards the land borders with Jordan and Egypt

title: Congress ‚Äòdeceives‚Äô OBCs, treats them only as vote bank, says BJP
content: The decision to conduct a fresh caste survey in Karnataka was driven by the motive of ‚Äòelectoral engineering‚Äô, says Union Minister Bhupender Yadav

title: RJD accuses ruling JD(U) of ‚Äònepotism‚Äô in Supreme Court panel counsel appointment
content: Senior RJD MP Manoj Jha says Janata Dal (United) national working president Sanjay Kumar Jha‚Äôs two daughters were made Group A panel counsel of the Union government in the Supreme Court without any necessary experience

title: Ban on use of drones near Kochi airport
content: The district administration has banned the operation of microlight aircraft, aero models, paragliders, Unmanned Aircraft Systems, powered hang gliders, laser beams, and hot-air balloons within a five-kilometre radius of the airport

title: Congress MLAs‚Äô PIL plea over Khajaguda land: HC directs them to submit representation afresh to government
content: Part of the construction was in the full tank level of the Khajaguda Lake, the petitioners told the Bench

title: UAE-based entrepreneur pledges ‚Çπ6 crore to families of medical students killed in Air India crash
content: Dr. Vayalil, founder and chairman of VPS Healthcare, a multinational healthcare group, described Manav, Aaryan, Rakesh, and Jaiprakash as ‚Äúfuture frontline heroes‚Äù

title: Surgical Gastro dept. at Thiruvananthapuram MCH celebrates golden jubilee
content: Department of Surgical Gastroenterology is the very first department to be established in a medical college to deal exclusively with complex gastrointestinal (GI) conditions needing surgical treatment in the country

title: Stranded Kashmiri students being shifted out of Iran‚Äôs capital Tehran to safer areas, say parents
content: A J&K Students Association spokesperson says students of Tehran University of Medical Sciences, Islamic Azad University and Iran University of Medical Sciences were successfully relocated; an estimate suggested 600 students from Kashmir were shifted to safer locations in Qom

title: Four women killed, several injured in firecracker factory explosion in Amroha
content: Blast in Atrasi village brings down entire structure; U.P. CM directs officials to expedite relief efforts

title: Karnataka HC upholds acquittal of former French consulate staffer Pascal Mazurier from charge of raping minor daughter
content: His wife had questioned the correctness of the trial court‚Äôs April 19, 2017 verdict acquitting Mr. Mazurier

title: Karnataka students in Iran, B-PAC team in Israel, seek to return amid tensions
content: The team was scheduled to return on the 14th. However, following the tensions with Iran, Israel closed down its airports and moved fleets of their major airlines out of the country¬†

title: No fervour for mango mela in Bengaluru, farmers report huge losses¬†
content: Farmers resorted to dumping the fruits in BBMP‚Äôs compactors as a sign of protest alleging poor publicity for the event, which led to fewer footfalls

title: Madurai City Round Table 99 along with Madurai City Ladies Circle 60 opens new block at Varichiyur govt. school
content: The initiative of the Round Table India was carried out under the Freedom Through Education (FTE) programme,

title: Don‚Äôt depend on agents for PF services, EPFO tells members
content: It says several cybercafe operators and fintech companies are charging EPFO members large sums of money for services that are officially free

title: Indore Congress councillor booked after accused in rape cases allege role in religious conversion
content: Anwar Qadri named in FIRs following claims by two arrested men; Congress terms case a political conspiracy

title: Rains: call to extend Plus One admission by a day

title: Restoration of Mullassery Canal in progress, HC told

title: Union govt. urged to increase support to States for skilling initiatives
content: Kerala Minister articulates State‚Äôs commitment to advancing the national skilling agenda while calling for greater cooperative federalism and equitable central support

content: The meeting did not decide on extension of SoO pact with the groups; SoO representative says they also proposed certain plans involving the security forces

title: G7 summit: 'Excluding Russia big mistake,' Trump slams Obama, Trudeau
content: our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, providing a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: Malik Tillman shines as USMNT secures a much-needed win
content: usmNT beat Trinidad and Tobago 5-0 at PayPal Park on sunday . the men's national team kicked off their 2025 gold cup run with a 5-0 win . Mauricio Pochettino and his men will now face saudi arabia on june 5 .

title: 2025 NBA Finals: Williams drops 40 to put Thunder one win away from title
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder dominated the majority of Game 1 of the NBA Finals . the Thunder led by as many as 18 points but held just a 95-93 edge after Pascal Siakam . but instead of letting the game slip away, Oklahoma City delivered its latest knockout blow .

title: Netanyahu says eliminating Khamenei would end crisis, 'We are fighting your enemy'

title: Eagles' Saquon Barkley changes offseason approach as he enters his 'prime'
content: a chorus of confidants is advising him to take a more measured approach to his training . he says he's not retiring anytime soon . barkley says the majority of those days is just mobility, conditioning, doing all the things .

title: NFC North roundtable: Who is the QB with the most to prove?
content: the NFC North is the only division in which all four teams have at least a 35% chance to make the playoffs, according to ESPN Analytics . the .662 win percentage was posted by a division since 2002 . all three teams were eliminated in their first game .

title: Waiver wire: Reshape your rotation with these high-strikeout pitchers
content: the 2025 fantasy baseball season is here! get the gang back together, or start a brand new tradition . right-hander Grant Holmes scored 24 fantasy points in a strong 6 1/3 inning effort . the performance gave Holmes a 43.0% strikeout rate in his past four starts . he has a 49% miss rate on his slider (39% usage of the pitch)

title: Bayern Munich's ruthless win in Club World Cup sets new FIFA record
content: Bayern Munich beat Auckland City 10-0 at the club world cup on sunday . the club is the most decorated club in germany's history . it's the same club that has won the Bundesliga 34 times and has a current player roster worth more than $1 billion .

title: Can Calvin Pickard backstop another Cup Final rally for the Oilers?
content: goaltender Calvin Pickard has helped save Edmonton from back-breaking deficits in this NHL postseason . pickard has forged a career excelling in secondary roles, the classic blue-collar contributor exemplifying work ethic and a straightforward mentality . he's just a normal guy, says kane, who's popular in his room .
